name: PetMyReindeer
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pet my reindeer
des:
Be the best digital pet owner! Walk, feed, sleep and wash your Reindeer to get its health and energy to 100%. Once at 100% your Reindeer can do tricks, enjoy belly rubs, fart and burp on command, play with the squeaky toy and play fetch.

Keep coming back to the skill to make sure your Reindeer is healthy and it's energy levels are at 100%.

Disclaimer: These are digital pets, it is just a game. Please do not try doing some of these actions in real life.

Thank you
Hugo FM
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
